channel.title: Can someone help me build a
channel.description: so im new to all this mopar scripting and stuff but i wanted to know how would it be possible to build a minefield like lets say you step over 1mill or a p hat and it blows up like a fireblast explosion :confused:? or another idea is to build a remote controled bomb not really remote control but you can group about 10 anti posions and they all explode at the same time when you press a certain emote anyone know how this is possible 1 more idea lol would it be possible to make redemption but with out having to die like a spell???? :confused: :|

item.title: Can someone help me build a
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

if (magicID == 1181 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { // Fire blast
ProjectileSpell(129, 130, 131, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 21, 1, 566, 560, 554, 4, 1, 5);
}

a bit hard to use soo much parameters I guess just try lol… you can remove the if () … and brackets since you dont require magic to cast this spell effect obvious just poiting it out

item.title: Can someone help me build a
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

that would be easy same as making safe zones… if player walks on a X,Y coordinate whre your item is… make a spell effect on top of him… and make him take damage becasue he maybe won’t if he is in a safe zone

add your X,Y checks to Player.java (getNextPlayerMovement method)
